Here‚Äôs the lineup for the series finale.

Today, we take a closer look at the Knights‚Äô pen. It has been better of late. Here‚Äôs who is leading the way.

@FutureSox @KnightsBaseball @whitesox https://t.co/13oaXAZAoI
@WhiteSoxCheech He‚Äôs having a terrific year!
@Mr_Jay369 @FutureSox @KnightsBaseball It could be but even if it is, it is still way too high. I could only imagine what it‚Äôd be if he had to face major-league pitching every day.

Knights‚Äô OBP Leaders

Before his call-up, Zavala had 40 hits & 26 walks for a team-leading .396 OBP.

Payton & Haseley have been the offensive catalysts but Remillard has quietly had a big year as well.

(MLB average OBP in 2022 is .312.)

@FutureSox @whitesox @KnightsBaseball https://t.co/6DpuJPA5Zx

The White Sox need pitching depth in its minor-league system & that appears to be the team‚Äôs focus in this week‚Äôs rookie draft. Two picks ‚Äî two (impressive) pitchers. 

Several more picks coming today & you can follow along here:

https://t.co/OZZGc026mH

Down 6-0, Knights rally late, get tying run on in 9th, but come up short, 6-3.

Knights‚Äô Roster News

‚ÄîJake Burger set to begin rehab tonight but felt ill when he got to ballpark & was sent home.

‚ÄîYasmani Grandal to catch again tonight.

‚ÄîRomy Gonzalez to go to AZ while team is on All-Star break to continue getting back in game shape.

@FutureSox @whitesox

@Mark_Marco_C @FutureSox @whitesox @KnightsBaseball Sox have lots of decisions to make in terms of the 40-man roster. Lots of guys to protect from Rule-5 draft, etc. Who do they see as their second baseman  of the future and what do they do with odd man out.
@DSnyds14 @JRFegan @FutureSox @whitesox Very true. I‚Äôm reminded about seeing all those guys like Fisk who can barely walk when their careers are over until they get knee replacements.

@DamienCollado @FutureSox @whitesox Seems to be moving ok. He did go first-to-third on a hit on Wednesday, & hustled home on a sac fly tonight. But the best sign of all is that he finally was behind the dish yesterday for the first time in his rehab.

.@MarkPayton2 impacts a game in multiple ways. 

Last night, his speed turned a 2B into a 3B, he added a clutch RBI single & his diving grab to save the game at the end was 1 of 2 great defensive plays on the night.

He brings it every night.

@FutureSox @whitesox @whitesox

This game-saving, game-ending grab (with 2 on) is worth a second look!

Payton is one of the most popular guys on the team, a vocal leader who also leads with hustle & desire.

In his last 11 games: 13 hits (.282), 7 for extra bases, 8 R, 7 RBI, SB. https://t.co/iP515pz7zh

No longer using ABS system in Charlotte. Beginning tonight, umps calling balls & strikes, but teams can challenge 3 calls. ABS system decides.

B6, Ryder Jones challenges a strike call ‚Äî successfully. So Knights keep 3 challenges.

@Rmusacch @FutureSox You‚Äôre right ‚Äî he‚Äôs 28 & in his prime years. But some guys pop a little later. I also think he may be a free agent after this season so lots of factors at play. But Sox desperate for offense.

Lots of player movement‚Ä¶

‚ÄîYasmani Grandal to Charlotte to continue his rehab.

‚ÄîWith Colas news, does Neslony (.326/.404/.578) get bumped to CLT?

@FutureSox @KnightsBaseball @whitesox https://t.co/8LpLm2HkXi
@Rmusacch Pretty sure they‚Äôre all on the same Tues-Sunday schedule but they all did play this past Monday because it was July 4 and then took Tuesday off.

@Rmusacch Sure. During Covid, MILB changed schedules to reduce travel. Every series was 6 games, Tues-Sun, Mondays for travel, & teams also  played nearby teams. They kept the 6-game format this year but expanded geography, thankfully.
@Noahp245 It is so hard to know, isn‚Äôt it? Gavin certainly got turned around, & guys like Adolfo, Remillard & Rutherford are showing improvement as well, so certainly could be CJ.
@Mark_Marco_C Well, they may have to lose one of them as soon as Grandal comes off the IL because neither Seby or McGuire have options left.

Knights home this week vs IronPigs (Philly).

Assuming Yasmani Grandal joins Knights to continue rehabbing.
